stories.headline: Iran fortifies underground complex near nuclear site, satellite images show
stories.description: Iran fortifies nuclear site underground amid heightened tensions with the US.

stories.headline: Former Israeli PM Barak responds to criticism over close Epstein links
stories.description: Ehud Barak, whose relationship with sex offender Jeffrey Epstein spanned 15 years, says he regrets ever meeting him.

stories.headline: US says it caused dollar shortage to trigger Iran protests: What that means

stories.headline: Madagascar cyclone death toll hits 38, 12,000 displaced; Mozambique braces
stories.description: Gezani is forecast to return to cyclone status when it strikes southern Mozambique on Friday evening.
